protagonist.background: Asian-American girl in a blended family in Appalachian Kentucky, working-class with a coal-miner stepdad
protagonist.struggle: English Language Learner gaps in academic vocabulary

full_idea.literacy_skill: Building vocabulary through context clues and word roots
full_idea.creative_integration: Lila's enthusiasm for inventing eco-gadgets involves researching scientific terms, using roots and clues from nature guides to expand her word knowledge

setting.secondary: Enchanted forest lab with glowing bio-luminescent plants

full_idea.unique_element: The bio-plants whisper vocabulary hints when Lila touches them, blending magic with science

From word-struggle woes to mastery moments, Lila engineers breakthroughs and shares her skills, proving that growing words can save the planet one invention at a time.
